snippet: Rosalyn Ng said her husband, Alexian Lien, with her and their 2-year-old in the car, acted reasonably in plowing through a menacing crowd that surrounded their car.
abstract: Rosalyn Ng, wife of driver of SUV involved in confrontation with large group of motorcyclists, speaks out for first time, saying she and her husband were terrified when crowd surrounded their vehicle after it struck one rider; says her husband Alexian Lien, who was later beaten by several motorcycle riders, acted reasonably in plowing through menacing crowd to try and escape.
lead_paragraph: Rosalyn Ng said her husband, Alexian Lien, with her and their 2-year-old in the car, acted reasonably in plowing through a menacing crowd that surrounded their car.

headline.main: Driver’s Wife Describes Fear of Angry ‘Mob’ of Bikers
headline.print_headline: Driver’s Wife Describes Fear Of Angry ‘Mob’ Of Bikers
